mapper.insert: insert into user (uid, username, password, email, phone, gender, avatar, role, status, regtime, regip, lastip, address) values (#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role = #{role,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, regtime = #{regtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, regip = #{regip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastip = #{lastip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select uid, username, password, email, phone, gender, avatar, role, status, regtime, regip, lastip, address from user where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select uid, username, password, email, phone, gender, avatar, role, status, regtime, regip, lastip, address from user
